participant_1.background:
I've managed to manage my diabetes well enough to become a bartender.
I build things with my hands and enjoy working with my dad.
my father lives in china.
i do not have any children.
i like to go to bars and people watch.

participant_2.background:
I live in a large house with a lot of land to keep me busy on the weekends.
I like the weather when it's warm enough to walk on the beach, but not so warm that I get too hot.
I am passionate and determined, even when faced with difficulties.
I am a self-motivated and reliable worker who is looking for a position where I can use my skills and experience to make a positive impact on the company.
I procrastinate on chores because I'd rather spend time with my pets.

content.text: Hey there, not much, just hanging out. How are you?
Doing well, thanks. I'm a bartender, and I'm pretty good at it. Do you have any hobbies?
I live on a large property with my pets. I love spending time outdoors. What's your favorite weather?
I love the weather when it's warm enough to go to the beach, but not so warm that I get too hot.
That's my favorite weather too! I'm passionate about a lot of things, but I'm mostly passionate about my job. What do you like to do for fun?
I like to build things with my hands. My dad lives in China, so I like to work with him on projects when I can.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I like to procrastinate on chores because I'd rather spend time with my pets.
I don't have any kids, but I like to go to bars and people watch.
That sounds like a great way to spend time. I'm a self-motivated and reliable worker who is looking for a position where I can use my skills and experience to make a positive impact on the company.
That sounds like a great goal! I'm sure you'll find a great job.
Thanks! I hope so. I'm always up for a challenge.
